limitation_categories: API rate limits and throttling restrictions

findings.limitation_paraphrased: API requests limited to 5 concurrent per user with 6000 requests per 5-minute window
findings.verbatim_snippet: The limit is 5 concurrent API requests per user
findings.page_title: Operational Limits for Dynamics 365 Business Central Online

findings.limitation_paraphrased: OData requests timeout after 8 minutes maximum processing time
findings.verbatim_snippet: Maximum time allocated to an OData V4 request is 8 minutes
findings.page_title: Operational Limits for Dynamics 365 Business Central Online

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Maximum batch size limited to 100 operations per OData batch request
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum number of operations in an OData V4 $batch request: 100
findings.page_title: Operational Limits for Dynamics 365 Business Central Online

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Database storage capped at 80GB per environment for essential license
findings.verbatim_snippet: 80 GB per environment (Essential license)
findings.page_title: Operational Limits for Dynamics 365 Business Central Online

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Maximum 200 webhook subscriptions per environment limits real-time payroll updates
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum number of webhook subscriptions: 200
findings.page_title: Operational Limits for Dynamics 365 Business Central Online

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Web service request size limited to 350MB preventing large payroll file uploads
findings.verbatim_snippet: Maximum size of a web service request: 350 MB
findings.page_title: Operational Limits for Dynamics 365 Business Central Online

findings.limitation_paraphrased: SuiteTalk API rate limited to 1000 requests per hour per integration
findings.verbatim_snippet: 1000 requests per hour per integration
findings.page_title: SuiteTalk REST Web Services Rate Limiting

findings.limitation_paraphrased: REST API batch requests limited to 25 sub-requests per batch operation
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 25 sub-requests per batch request

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Search API returns maximum 1000 records per request requiring pagination
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 1000 records can be returned
findings.page_title: SuiteTalk REST Web Services Search Operations

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Concurrent request limit varies by account type affecting simultaneous payroll processing
findings.verbatim_snippet: concurrent request limits vary by account edition

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Custom segments limited to 4 per record impacting cost center granularity
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 4 custom segments per record

findings.limitation_paraphrased: API rate limited to 500 requests per minute per company with burst allowance
findings.verbatim_snippet: 500 requests per minute per QuickBooks company

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Batch requests limited to 25 operations per batch with 30 batches per minute
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 25 operations per batch request

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Change Data Capture polling limited to every 5 minutes minimum
findings.verbatim_snippet: minimum polling interval is 5 minutes

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Class tracking limited to single dimension per transaction line
findings.verbatim_snippet: only one class can be assigned per line item

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Custom fields limited to 3 per entity restricting payroll metadata storage
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 3 custom fields per entity

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Report data limited to 365 days historical access without pagination
findings.verbatim_snippet: reports limited to 365 days of historical data

findings.limitation_paraphrased: API calls limited to 60 per minute and 5000 per day per organization
findings.verbatim_snippet: 60 calls per minute and 5,000 calls per day

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Maximum 5 concurrent API calls restricting real-time payroll processing
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 5 concurrent requests at any time

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Batch operations limited to 100 items per request affecting bulk uploads
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 100 items per batch request

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Payroll API requires admin permissions limiting integration user access options
findings.verbatim_snippet: payroll endpoints require admin user permission

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Tracking categories limited to 2 active categories per organization
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 2 tracking categories can be active

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Historical data access limited to 7 years for standard subscriptions
findings.verbatim_snippet: historical data available for 7 years

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Webhooks limited to 1000 per application affecting real-time sync capabilities
findings.verbatim_snippet: maximum of 1000 webhook endpoints per application

findings.verbatim_snippet: sync frequency depends on platform-specific rate limits

findings.limitation_paraphrased: Webhook delivery limited to 10 retry attempts before permanent failure

research_notes.methodology: Systematic search through official documentation sources only
quality_standards: All findings backed by official vendor documentation only
Verbatim snippets are exact quotes from source materials
Paraphrases focus on specific business impacts for HR/Payroll integration
Sources verified as accessible and current
